review: The Chromecast met my expectations. I did extensive research on the item before I purchased so I knew exactly what I was getting. It has performed exactly as described and I use it on a daily basis to stream Netflix, HuluPlus and sometimes my Chrome browser to my 55" television. It does everything seamlessly. My tv is actually a smart tv, but the Netflix and Hulu apps tend to lag when played directly from the tv itself. This doesn't happen with the chromecast. I highly recommend the Chromecast to anyone who would like to stream these apps to their tv.

review: This thing is great so far. I'm using a macbook and i-phone to stream things. Couple of draw-backs for apple users right now: You can't cast the hulu app currently from the i-phone. I have also had some connection issues when casting chrome from my mac-book. However, this is still a relatively new product and they're working out the kinks. I trust google to figure out some of the issues and grant wider access to other streaming app's down the line...for the price, it's been well worth it compared to the other options.
